SEARCH
Module io.inverno.mod.http.base
Package io.inverno.mod.http.base.router

Interface MethodRoute<A>

Type Parameters:
A - the resource type
All Superinterfaces:
Route<A>
public interface MethodRoute<A> extends Route<A>

An HTTP method route.

This is used to define route based on the HTTP method specified in an input. For instance, in order to resolve a handler for an HTTP request with a POST method, a method route must be defined with POST method targeting a POST handler.

Since:
1.12
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
